summary: This is a transcript of FBI Special Agent bfrei's testimony before a federal grand jury in West Palm Beach on May 8, 2007, regarding Operation Leap Year. The agent details the issuance and response to numerous subpoenas for financial, medical, and other records related to Jeffrey Epstein and his associates, as part of the investigation into potential crimes involving underage victims.

persons.name: bfrei
persons.context: The testifying agent assigned to Operation Leap Year, who details the subpoenas issued and records received as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the grand jury investigation (Operation Leap Year). Subpoenas were issued for his bank accounts, wire transfers, credit cards, and medical records.

persons.name: Thomas Rofranno
persons.context: A chiropractor who was subpoenaed (OLY-33) for medical records related to Jeffrey Epstein as a patient. He provided materials in March 2007.

persons.name: Philip W. May
persons.context: The court reporter who certified the transcript of the grand jury testimony.

connections.description: FBI Special Agent bfrei is investigating Jeffrey Epstein as part of Operation Leap Year, detailing subpoenas for his records.
Thomas Rofranno is a chiropractor who had Jeffrey Epstein as a patient, as evidenced by the subpoena for medical records.

events.title: Grand Jury Testimony on Operation Leap Year
events.description: FBI Special Agent bfrei testifies before a federal grand jury in West Palm Beach, detailing the status of subpoenas and evidence collection in the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Subpoenas Served on Western Union and Chase
events.description: Subpoenas OLY-30 and OLY-31 served on Western Union Financial Services, and OLY-32 served on J.P. Morgan Chase Bank, seeking wire transfer and bank records related to Jeffrey Epstein and potential victims.

events.title: Subpoena for Birth Certificates
events.description: Subpoena OLY-36 served on the Palm Beach County Health Department seeking birth certificates of victims under investigation.

events.title: Subpoenas Served on Adult Video Warehouse
events.description: Subpoenas OLY-41 and OLY-34 served on the Adult Video Warehouse seeking transaction records for Jeffrey Epstein and individuals working for or with him.

keyFacts: The investigation was codenamed 'Operation Leap Year' and involved a federal grand jury in West Palm Beach.
Subpoenas targeted Jeffrey Epstein's financial records (banks, Western Union wire transfers to girls/victims, credit cards) and his medical records from a chiropractor.

Subpoenas were also issued to obtain birth certificates of victims from the Palm Beach County Health Department and transaction records from the Adult Video Warehouse related to Epstein and his associates.
The testimony reveals an active, multi-faceted financial and records investigation into Epstein's activities and potential payments to victims in early 2007.
Key names of the testifying agent and a court reporter are provided, but the Assistant U.S. Attorney and Grand Jury Foreperson are redacted.
